pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plant Phenotyping and Bayesian Statistics // Analyse common types of plant phenotyping data, provide a simplified interface to longitudinal growth modeling and select Bayesian statistics, and streamline use of 'PlantCV' output. Several Bayesian methods and reporting guidelines for Bayesian methods are described in Kruschke (2018) doi:10.1177/2515245918771304, Kruschke (2013) doi:10.1037/a0029146, and Kruschke (2021) doi:10.1038/s41562-021-01177-7.
